Instead of a shapeless "vacuum shell", Hinata forms a lion-shaped shroud of [[chakra]], identical to the one created by the [[Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists]]. It is used to attack the opponent from a distance, blowing them off their feet.

== Trivia ==
* A lion's roar is heard after Hinata uses this technique.
